Reviews.Title: “Would not recommend this hotel to any non-smoker!”
Reviews.Author: MomOfEMM
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel 2 nights 3 children pool nice decent size bit overcrowded furniture desk chair chair ottoman bench etc fridge microwave wonderful nonsmoking hallway smoke bad venting people smoking smelled smokey majority time smelled coming bathroom vent closed bathroom door helped breakfast okay especially trying save little time money smokiness major turnoff recommend hotel nonsmoker
